Summit on Responsible Computing, AI, and Society October 28-30, 2024, Atlanta, Georgia, USA
  • Agenda
  • Speakers
  • Venue
  • Doctoral Consortium
  • Organization
  • Registration

    Doctoral Consortium

    The Doctoral Consortium on Responsible Computing, AI, and Society will be held on October 28th in the Georgia Tech Hotel on Georgia Tech campus, Conference Room A.

    The Doctoral Consortium will provide opportunities to receive mentorship on the crucial issues navigating research in responsible computing, AI, and policy.

    Schedule

    The Doctoral Consortium will be held in the Georgia Tech Hotel, Conference Room A.

    Time Activity
    11:30 Doctoral Consortium: Welcome
    12:00 Lunch + meeting mentors
    1:30 Lightning talks, part 1
    2:30 Break
    2:45 Lightning talks, part 2
    3:45 Birds-of-a-feather groups
    4:45 Break
    5:00 Panel (Moderated by Neha Kumar)
    6:00 Doctoral Consortium Dinner (TSRB building, Interactive Computing Cafe, 2nd floor)
